name: Hawkeye

abilities.name: Trick Arrow
abilities.damage: Varies by type (Standard: ~70, Explosive: ~80 AoE, Sonic: ~30 + Debuff)
abilities.details: Fires the currently selected arrow type.

abilities.name: Select Arrow
abilities.details: Cycles through available arrow types (e.g., Standard, Explosive, Grapple, Sonic).

abilities.name: Grapple Arrow
abilities.details: Fires a grappling arrow to pull himself rapidly to terrain.

ultimate.name: Hunter's Volley
ultimate.effect: Fires a massive volley of arrows raining down into a target area.
ultimate.details: Deals significant area damage over a short duration.

passives.name: Master Archer
passives.details: Arrows fly faster and straighter. Possibly reduced weapon sway.

passives.name: Quiver
passives.details: Manages ammo count for different arrow types, which replenish over time.

teamups.effect: Explosive Arrow radius increased when near specified allies.

lore: Clint Barton, a former circus performer turned master archer and Avenger. Despite lacking superpowers, his unparalleled skill with a bow and arrow makes him a valuable asset.
